Randomize Ghost Matter.tooltip: In places where the vanilla game and randomizer logic expect you to find a safe path using the camera, this randomizes which path is safe each loop.

Randomize Stranger Codes.tooltip: Randomizes the codes for code totems on the Stranger and in the Dreamworld. Only works if randomized coordinates are enabled.

Death Link Override.tooltip: 'No Override' means use the death_link option from the .yaml used to generate the multiworld. Any other value will override and ignore the .yaml option.

LocationAppearanceMatchesContents.title: Colorize Locations By AP Item Type
LocationAppearanceMatchesContents.tooltip: Adjusts Nomai arc text color to match what quality of check it holds. Recommended to use with Auto Expand Nomai Text. Changes to this setting will only apply at the start of the next loop.

Auto Expand Nomai Text.tooltip: With this on, all Nomai text in the game will start in an expanded state, allowing you to read it without having to wait for it to expand. Changes to this setting will only apply at the start of the next loop.

Instant Translator.tooltip: With this on, your translator will translate Nomai Text instantly.
